reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars all around great purchase
reviews.reviewText: The stand is OK, with no issues but it doesn't work in my situation -- I have it fastened between two shelves on my desk -- the buttons are on the right side back panel near the bottom so I can get to them with this mounting situation -- this monitor is very light -- it doesn't have the Gel in the screen so it doesn't distort when you run your finger across it -- I am 73 tears old and have lost my fascination with tweaking resolutions and colour adjustments so I looked through the on-screen menus and left every one of the adjustments at default -- colours are great, everything in focus everything seems well made -- no gaming for me but I have watched a couple of movies on this and the picture was great -- only the slightest amount of heat from the bottom 2" of the unit front and back -- no sound at first from the monitor or the external speakers -- my external speakers were plugged into my dock -- when I plugged them into the monitor I got sound and didn't chase it past that point -- I believe I should have gotten a USB-c cable but there was not one in the box -- there was the extra cable shown in the what's included picture -- not really interested in exploreing the USB-c connection anyway -- I was in multiple repair positions over the past 55+ years so now I just want something I can plug in and it works -- I would buy this again in a heart beat

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I would say that this monitor is really good the display is really good simple and easy to use the one speaker sound good not great but good and really good price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent for a budget Monitor.
reviews.reviewText: Packaging is good & Shipped as promised on time.This is not a bad monitor ultra thin, built well and the colors seem to be pretty accurate under the default settings except brightness i turned it down from 80. 100 hertz shows up on windows display settings after a reset. I tried 100 then dropped it to 75 because didn't see much difference. I was running a 60 hertz monitor before and there is a big improvement. Adjustment keys feel cheap but function just fine. Display is full screen no bordering. The stand is a little on the wobbly side when using color adjustment buttons. Screen tilting is adjustable but left to right is stand movement only. Easy stand install to the screen is firm. Picture quality is solid i didn't see any screen tearing while gaming and videos look great. if your a gamer on a budget this monitor does work and I wouldn't hesitate to livestream at all on it i would buy another one depending on the longevity in the future . I call this a good deal for a functioning monitor with a solid 1080 projection.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Arrived damaged but was immediately replaced
reviews.reviewText: I bought the monitor for my son... He was so excited when it arrived, he had been waiting!! Hooked it up... No sound and a big discoloration in the upper right corner... Talked to the service team and was told all kinds of things to do only to find out it still didnt work...Only easy part was the return and they sent a new one right away which is why the 3 stars..

reviews.reviewTitle: Great product at a great price.
reviews.reviewText: Minimalist design and takes little desk space. Works great. Beautiful colours and graphics.

This monitor is about what you would expect for the price. It's a good budget gaming monitor. The one I got had one piece of hair stuck behind the screen near the top right corner - I've seen monitors twice this price with more dead/stuck pixels/hair than this, so unfortunately this is expected and common for modern monitors (hardware isn't what it used to be). I didn't notice any ghosting, which is surprising given a monitor at this lower price point.The included stand is very cheap feeling but it's usable, be careful how you have your monitor attached because it's not the most secure unless you hear it snap and even then be careful.I imagine this monitor would be much better if you attach a nice VESA mount to it so you could position it anywhere you want.It's a fine monitor for the price and you know what you're getting at this price point.edit: Honestly, this monitor is pretty good. It got a spec of dust/hair behind the screen in the very top right corner, but my brand new $300 Dell G2524H monitor had a very noticeable stuck bright red pixel in the lower middle of the monitor. I returned the Dell and got a (VIVO Single Monitor Desk Stand aka STAND-V001H) VESA stand (though a VESA arm would work too) for this, I'm keeping this display, and I'm damn impressed. Time will tell how this monitor holds up and I will edit my review if necessary but for now, good job SANSUI. I am impressed.
4 stars because Amazon website did not apply the $25 dollar discount…🤔
You literally cannot beat this deal. 165hz. IPS display. And it frequently goes on sale. Couldn’t ask for more.
